overview: Darling returns for another lesson in submissive obedience in this high powered opus to the BDSM arts! Seems as we open, that Master Warlock has hogtied his little plaything to keep her nice and secure while he’s away. As she waits for her master’s return, she struggles against her bonds, the ropes wound tightly against her supple skin, the gag planted securely planted into her slavish mouth.  After a long day, master comes home looking to discipline away the stress of the day, and his plaything is just the ticket!
title: Lessons In Obedience
